post.title: Judge Drafts Opinion with AI but it Hallucinates
post.excerpt: The Federal judge was forced to take back his opinion once it was revealed that it referenced fake court cases and added fake quotes: https://x.com/sanayshajith/status/1949168651052966292?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
